MemoryInfobox.name: Travel Restriction
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A midwife prevented from traveling to pregnant women by soldiers asked for help.'

General_Description: '''Travel Restriction''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A midwife sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''I have [[drachma]]e for anyone who can help me deal with a camp of soldiers. Come speak with me to learn more.'' She sought out the midwife and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''The soldiers and their commander who have set up camp near the village are tyrants. They control our movements and won't let us leave.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Why do you want to leave? Are you fleeing?'' *'''Woman:''' ''No, but there are several pregnant women who live outside the village. If the soldiers keep me from helping them, they and their babies will likely die.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me guess. You want me to kill him.'' *'''Woman:''' ''It's not an easy task, but yes, the Spartan must be killed./Yes, the Athenian commander must fall.'' (Accept - The commander's head is mine.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you. You have my word.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I'm in your debt.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.'' Kassandra sought out the commander and killed him before returning to the midwife. *'''Woman:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You do good work, ''misthios''. Take this for your trouble.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]].

*'''Note:'''
''I have [[drachma]]e for anyone who can help me deal with a camp of soldiers. Come speak with me to learn more.''
She sought out the midwife and addressed her.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the board. What's going on?''
*'''Woman:''' ''The soldiers and their commander who have set up camp near the village are tyrants. They control our movements and won't let us leave.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Why do you want to leave? Are you fleeing?''
*'''Woman:''' ''No, but there are several pregnant women who live outside the village. If the soldiers keep me from helping them, they and their babies will likely die.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Let me guess. You want me to kill him.''
*'''Woman:''' ''It's not an easy task, but yes, the Spartan must be killed./Yes, the Athenian commander must fall.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you. You have my word.''
Kassandra sought out the commander and killed him before returning to the midwife.
*'''Woman:''' ''You do good work, ''misthios''. Take this for your trouble.''
